Posts.Content: Nov 1, 2017 05:35PM kowgiirl_up wrote: QUOTE: tlfrank "Welp, got my genetics back and I don't have any mutations related to breast cancer,"  That's awesome news and a relief I'm sure! I'm glad you got that over with so you can move forward too. I elected not to do the testing b/c of insurance (I wish I could have). I may do it in the future but that may be putting the cart before the horse at this point~ IDK.  There's quite a few of us getting rads or about to this month. I wish us all luck.

I had my second surgery 2 weeks ago this coming Thursday so I'm pretty happy that they're moving me forward with rads. I want this behind me as fast as possible :-)
